data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: The job crisis is undoubtedly one of the most critical problems for almost all countries. I believe there are many prudent steps that government can take to reduce the level of unemployment. First and foremost, I think the government should build more learning centers to improve human capital to make the workforce more employable. Entrepreneurship and innovation should also be encouraged to create new products and market demand, which will generate new employment opportunities. Lastly, lower employment taxes should also be offered to increase labor demand. The challenges faced by implementing these measures are many. I think the main issue here is that it usually takes a long time and a lot of debates among policymakers in some countries to make a sound decision. It will be too slow to make social changes. (135 words)
data.referenceText: In what ways can society assist the unemployed in finding work? What are some of the challenges in doing this?
data.referenceTranslate: 社会可以通过哪些方式帮助失业者找到工作? 这样做的挑战是什么
